posts.post_content:
Way before back collecting was in vogue - dad and I bought literally thousands of T206s often searching for tough backs.  In the time we founds almost every possible back … except for Ty Cobb, Brown Lenox, Drum and BL460.  We had to buy these separately at auctions.   

Flash forward to 2023 - offered here are two of those extremely tough backs - a trimmed drum and a low grade brown Lenox.  These are duplicates in our back run … so happy to give another collector a shot.  Please sent inquiries / interest to [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
Scott, Neat story! Do you still have a lot of T206`s?  Wish my Dad collected cards in stead of stamps. Could have had a lot of neat cards.  Thanks,  Marc

Thanks Marc.  Just a handful - with the most notable being Cobb/Cobb

Best wishes
Scott
Many inquiries but no deal yet.  Pricing is $6k for trimmed Drum and $10k for PSA 1 brown Lenox.  Pics available upon request and would consider partial cash and partial trade.
